full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DUS MCHOD CHEN PO BZHI'I TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B DUS MCHOD CHEN @006A *, ,PO BZHI'I TSIGS LE'UR BYAS PA KHA CHE'I PAndI TA SH'AKYA SHR'IS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,PAndI TA DE NYID DANG SGRA BSGYUR GYI LO TZ'A BA BYAMS PA'I DPAL GYIS BSGYUR BA'O,, ,,` DPAR 'DI KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU GNYIS PA YI, HU CAR THU YI KHU RAL ZHES GRAGS PA, ,BKRA SHIS CHOS KYI GLING DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGES, ,'GRO KUN LTA SPYOD RNAM DAG SPYOD GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BHAm DHU SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,)
